name: Kinderzimmer
description: A shared room for all your connoisseurs. Used to be a cupboard.
effect: Connoisseurs assign +2 artworks to artists per second.

name: Own desk
description: Not having to share one is a blessing.
effect: Connoisseurs assign twice as much artworks to artists per second.

name: Aby Warburg Library access
description: Give your connoisseurs access to Aby Warburg library.
effect: Connoisseurs assign twice as much artworkd to artists per second.

name: Know-it-all Connoisseurs
description: These know-it-all are starting to think they are important. So let them go to the reserves and assign the webs to the spiders.
effect: Connoisseurs assign twice as much artworks to artists per second.

name: Human Photocopiers
description: All books must be photocopied at least once.
effect: Master Students photocopies twice as much artworks' references in books per second.

name: Summer Internship
description: Offer them a summer internship because they have wasted time revising their exams rather than photocopying books.
effect: Master Students study twice as much artworks per second.

name: Subject of Study
description: Find them a subject of study for their thesis (and incidentally for the exhibition project).
effect: Master Students study twice as much artworks per second.

name: Mentoring
description: Weekly counseling with a professional art historian.
effect: Master Students study twice as much artworks to artists per second.

name: Thesis supervision
description: Somebody takes care of your PhD Students.
effect: PhD Students study +16 artworks per second.

name: Own office
description: Each PhD student gets a quiet place for themselves.
effect: PhD Students study twice as much artworks per second.

name: Research Abroad
description: 1 year of research stay abroad for your PhD students.
effect: PhD Students study twice as much artworks per second.

name: Student Assistant
description: A personal assistant that takes care of boring tasks.
effect: PhD Students study twice as much artworks per second.

name: Project Management Seminar
description: Hard work also requires soft skills.
effect: Postdocs study +50 artworks per second.

name: Higher Travel Allowances
description: Let your Postdocs go to more conferences.
effect: Postdocs study twice as much artworks per second.

name: Teaching-free year
description: A year without teaching means more productivity.
effect: Postdocs study twice as much artworks per second.

name: Job security
description: You wish...
effect: Postdocs study twice as much artworks per second.

name: Daycare
description: Someone to take care of your staff's children.
effect: Permanent staff curates +20k artworks per second.

name: Company Car
description: Let your Staff use cars you pay for.
effect: Permanent staff curates twice as much artworks per second.

name: Leadership Seminar
description: Teach your Permanent Staff some people skills.
effect: Permanent staff curates twice as much artworks per second.

name: Office close to the Coffee Machine
description: Coffee => Productivity. Simple.
effect: Permanent staff curates twice as much artworks per second.

name: Bookworms
description: Hire extra librarian assistants to take work off your art historians' shoulders.
effect: Art historians study +300k artworks per second.

name: Extra Secretary
description: Secretaries have to do a lot of work at University. It's good to have them!
effect: Art historians study twice as much artworks per second.

name: Sabbatical
description: Art historians take a year off teaching to be more productive.
effect: Art historians study twice as much artworks per second.

name: Online Courses
description: Record once, use often. No more useless time spent in lectures.
effect: Art historians study twice as much artworks per second.

name: Secretariat
description: The heart of the organization of your museum.
effect: Permanent staff study +3M artworks per second.

name: Photocopier Room
description: The production line of your museum.
effect: Permanent staff study twice as much artworks per second.

name: Curatorial Offices
description: At this point, your museum can afford to have curators in its permanent staff.
effect: Permanent staff curate twice as much artworks per second.

name: Restoration Workshops
description: Our permanent staff must be able to restore damaged artworks.
effect: Permanent staff produce twice as much artworks per second.

name: Repatriation Department
description: Sh*t, we have to give back works to their supposedly legitimate owners (when they are universal treasures)!
effect: Permanent staff produce twice as much artworks per second.

name: Poster Sessions
description: Have your ICOM student members prepare interesting posters and explain them to their peers.
effect: ICOM members study +80M artworks per second.

name: Annual Symposium
description: Interesting symposium given by the best in the field.
effect: ICOM members study twice as much artworks per second.

name: ICOM Triennale
description: A nice get-together to increase morale in the group.
effect: ICOM members study twice as much artworks per second.

name: Pump Hall Parties
description: Awesome parties in the United States pump hall. Sure the hangover does not increase productivity but your morale gets a huge boost.
effect: ICOM members study twice as much artworks per second.

name: Free coffee
description: Addictively delicious. Also free.
effect: All workers produce twice as much artworks per second.

name: Expeditions
description: Increased artworks acquisition with official archaeological or enthnological expeditions (and illegal excavations by night).
effect: Double the amount of artworks per click.

description: Increased artworks acquisition by purchasing on black market.
effect: Double the amount of artworks per click.

description: Increased artworks acquisition by hiring professional art forgers.

name: School of Fine Arts

effect: Double the amount of artworks per click.

name: Art and Antique Dealers

name: Auction Houses

name: Purchasing other museums
description: Increased artworks acquisition by purchasing of other museums.
effect: Double the amount of artworks per click.

name: Industrialized AI
description: Increased artworks acquisition by the industralization of an artistic AI.
effect: Double the amount of artworks per click.
